title: Charleston Marathon Ride after the Races

address.street: 1565 Rifle Range Road  (bus parking area in rear)

course:
see web site - short course is about 20 miles, medium course is about 43 miles, and long is about 60 miles
optional course thru historic Charleston
http://charlestonmarathon.com/weekend-events/bike-ride/
notes:
long course starts at 8:30
medium course at 8:45 and
short course at 9:00
directions:
Whitesides Elementary 
1565 Rifle Range Road  
Mount Pleasant, SC 29464
link to google maps 
 
http://goo.gl/maps/vvxwN

title: USAC Regional Talent ID Road Camp (Furman Uni
The Magnet Crit
description: The Charleston weekday series is now one event on Wednesday, September 17th. Well be racing around the Academic Magnet School just west of Park Circle.
registration: Registration will be available on site only. $20 to race (one day licenses add $15)
directions: Academic Magnet school at 5109 W Enterprise St, North Charleston, SC 29403.

title: Hincapie Gran Fondo
description: One day Gran Fondo - distances vary 80 mile, 50 Mile, 15 mile

title: Road Titan 300
description:
ROAD TITANS 300+ Cycling Challenge, a three-day fully supported premiere cycling adventure and a professional-like experience like no other, designed to defy the limits of endurance with a road course in one of National Geographic’s “Destinations of a Lifetime”, Oconee, South Carolina.



THE EVENT: 

ROAD TITANS 300+ combines one of the most ambitious professional-like cycling experiences south of the Mason-Dixon Line with the breathtaking scenery of the surrounding locale.
 
ROAD TITANS 300+ is not a race, but a battle to overcome the voices within -an opportunity to defeat them hand in hand with willpower, determination, and unswayable perseverance, traversing 100+ miles each day.

title: Gamecock 'Cross
description:
The opening race of the 2014 SECCC Cyclocross season will be taking place in Ridgeway, SC!
Collegiate races in the morning, followed by USAC amateur categories in the afternoon. 
Onsite lodging and camping is available!
registration:
Register online through USA Cycling. 

For larger collegiate teams, contact Joseph Middleton at flywitheagles11@yahoo.com with registration info
directions:
From I-77, take exit 34 for SC-34 East toward Ridgeway.
Turn left onto Church St. 
Church St. turns into Longtown Rd. The Lodge is located on the left

title: Greenville CX Cup

address.street: West Side Park, 2700 Blue Ridge Dr.

description: The Greenville Cup is a first year State Level E Cyclocross Event.  We offer one day of racing at Westside Park, which is owned and operated by the Greenville County Parks, Recreation and Tourism.   Race Categories are similar to those in our region to stay consistent and our one day prize purse is $1000 split between various elite and amateur categories.
course: The Greenville Cup course has it all!  A mixture of everything a racer can ask for.  More details will be posted on the event Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/events/1473000666296997/
registration: Event Registration Information is posted here: https://www.pre-reg.com/Users/RacerMain.aspx?Type=1&EventID=855.  Pre-reg closes on Friday, November 7th at 12 PM.
notes:
USA CYCLING RULES APPLY.  You must race your category, no exceptions. 
Parking for this event is strictly to paved areas, no exceptions.
directions: Event Address: 2700 W. Blue Ridge Drive, Greenville, SC 29611
